name: Don't Drown (Ji9sw)
description:
Don't Drown is an intense and thrilling game where the player is trapped in a prison cell that is quickly filling up with water. The player's objective is to find a chisel hidden somewhere in the cell and use it to chisel a hole in the roof to escape before drowning. This game was developed in just five hours for the DDG Jam #2

The game is very simple and a fair bit challenging if you don't know what you're doing, but after playing once you should understand.

This game won't be updated any further.
